I am a very new user of cantera and was hoping to ask a few basic 
questions (if these exist in an FAQ somewhere please direct me):

Is it possible to do equilibrium calculations on mixtures with 
condensed species? like H2O or C(GR)? I couldn't see how this would 
be done from the examples included in the distribution.

Is it possible to specify streams for an equilibrium calcuation based 
on elemental composition? (i.e., an ultimate analysis of coal?)

Has anyone developed a plug flow reactor for cantera yet?

thanks much,
Dave
